channel.title: Comments on: House of Whack Now Available for Pre-Order
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Dad
item.dc:creator: Dad
item.description: Congratulations! Your efforts, dedication, and patience have finally paid off. Kudos to you. Dad
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! Your efforts, dedication, and patience have finally paid off. Kudos to you. Dad

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Thanks, folks! Actually, there will be expansions available online around the time the game ships!
item.content:encoded: Thanks, folks! Actually, there will be expansions available online around the time the game ships!

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
Congratulations... Glad to see the dream finally realized. I just finished ordering myself a copy.
So when are the expansion sets coming out? ;)
Jeff
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations… Glad to see the dream finally realized. I just finished ordering myself a copy.

So when are the expansion sets coming out? ðŸ˜‰

Jeff

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
It is done. (do you hear the chiming in the hall?)
Well met, sir.
And just in time for Christmas:)
item.content:encoded:
It is done. (do you hear the chiming in the hall?)

Well met, sir.
